org.apache.beam.runners.spark.stateful

Class SparkGroupAlsoByWindowViaWindowSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.spark.stateful.SparkGroupAlsoByWindowViaWindowSet

  • public class SparkGroupAlsoByWindowViaWindowSet
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of GroupAlsoByWindowViaWindowSetDoFn logic for grouping by windows and controlling trigger firings and pane accumulation.

    This implementation is a composite of Spark transformations revolving around state management using Spark's PairDStreamFunctions.updateStateByKey(Function1, Partitioner, boolean, ClassTag) to update state with new data and timers.

    Using updateStateByKey allows to scan through the entire state visiting not just the updated state (new values for key) but also check if timers are ready to fire. Since updateStateByKey bounds the types of state and output to be the same, a (state, output) tuple is used, filtering the state (and output if no firing) in the following steps.
